thread.title: Europe Flights on United from $831+ R/T
thread.title_full: Europe Flights on United from $831+ R/T

title: Europe Flights on United from $831+ R/T
text:
Home > Flight Deals > Europe Flights on United from $831+ R/T Europe Flights on United from $831+ R/T July 23, 2015 5:46pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Ditch the crowds and peak season's high rates by doing Europe during the shoulder season. Fall flights to Brussels, Dublin, London, Zurich, and more than a couple dozen other European routes are on sale with United. 
Round-trip, taxes-and-fees-inclusive prices start at $831; and must be booked by August 6. Travel is valid August 23 - October 31; but minimum-night-stay restrictions of at least 10 days won't work for those seeking a short trip. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
